lead_paragraph: A gunman killed Burundi's environment and water minister early on Sunday, police said, the first senior government figure to be murdered in nearly two years of political violence.
snippet: A gunman killed Burundi's environment and water minister early on Sunday, police said, the first senior government figure to be murdered in nearly two years of political violence....

headline.main: Burundi Minister Shot Dead in Capital: Police
headline.print_headline: Burundi Minister Shot Dead in Capital: Police
